mission.posting: P4sett needs help with some degrees.

email.subject: Cheating
email.body:
Hello new one.
I need help with a Degree, I completed my programming career but the bastards didn't want to give me my degree 'cause they found out I'm a hacker, and I don't know what the big deal is, since then they've treated me like shit, I'm tired of that, I want you to get into my uni server and add the following Degree.
Name: Parnel Hunnisett Degree: Masters in Programming Uni: Saint Bernard GPA: 3.0
